content: in ch3-space turn row 6 ch3 v-st-increase in 1st v-st v-st in each v-st across row ignoring the last v-st formed by ch4 double_crochet that started the previous row turn finishing off cut the yarn and weave in the ends and secure them thoroughly with a darning needle pattern copyright susan sands 2017 this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or commercial use of this pattern or any of its parts is not allowed
